name: Traffic racers 3D jigsaw puzzles for toddlers, kids and teenagers with muscle cars, street rod and a classic car puzzle
name_original: Traffic racers 3D jigsaw puzzles for toddlers, kids and teenagers with muscle cars, street rod and a classic car puzzle
description:
A super 3D puzzle collection for racing fans!

Features:
18 car puzzles in 3D, from 6 to 14 puzzle pieces with fast cars, and many more.
You can collect stickers of each car puzzle in the sticker book.
Positive feedback for each action your child makes.
(Once a puzzle is finished, touch the falling gold-stones :)
Chilling music, sounds and effects.
Large pieces, easy for children to pick and move.
Increasing difficulty level as your child advances from puzzle to puzzle.
HD graphics, suitable for new HD devices.
